header.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_gomapsext_domain_model_map

trans-unit.source: github.com | https://github.com/googlemaps/js-marker-clusterer
googlemaps.github.io | http://googlemaps.github.io/js-samples/styledmaps/wizard/index.html
You can choose, create or edit an address. New addresses will be saved on the current page.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez choisir, créer ou modifier une adresse. Les nouvelles adresses seront enregistrées sur la page actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Only 1 address used as destination. Display an text input for enter a starting point.
trans-unit.target: Une seule adresse utilisée comme destination. Affiche un champ texte pour entrer le point de départ.

trans-unit.source: The class of the map container
trans-unit.target: La classe CSS du conteneur de la carte.

trans-unit.source: Maptype on the beginning.
A double click on the map zooms in. Draggable map has to be enabled!
Position of the map can be changed.
trans-unit.target: La position sur la carte peut être modifiée.

trans-unit.source: Set the height of the map. Default in px, for percentages enter %, e.g. '100%'.
trans-unit.target: Détermine la hauteur de la carte. En pixels par défaut, pour un pourcentage, entrez %, par exemple '100%'.

trans-unit.source: The KML file is stored on this server. The specified path is relative. Only markers appear.
The viewport of the kml file will be ignored. Set zoom and at least one address to configure the viewport.
Enter an URL of a KML file, e.g. "http://gmaps-samples.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ggeoxml/cta.kml".
Shows a control to change the map type.
Possible map types to choose. Map type control has to be enabled.
Many markers in the same region will be summarized and appear as a cluster.
The size of the Clusters, like a radius.
JSON Code, for more information view details
Up to this zoom level the Clusters are displayed.
Displays a form on the frontend, were the user can enter a search word. Searchs for InfoWindow content and title of a marker. The InfoWindow of the first found marker opens.
Show arrows to change the position of the map.
Displays a measure.
Enables zoom with scroll wheel.
Displays a list with all addresses incl. a link. If you click the selected address will be centered.
Displays for each category a checkbox. Only the selected categories will be shown.
2 address records needed! Shows the route between the given points.
Shows an icon to enable the streetview.
JSON Code, for more view details
Shown in the map type control.
Will be used as ID (without space character, special character!).
Shown by mouse over.
Select a travel mode or let the frontend user select one.
Select a unit system or let the frontend user select one.
Set the width of the map. Default in px, for percentages enter %, e.g. '100%'.
Only need to set if default zoom is wrong.
Enable buttons to change the zoom.
Choose beetween large and small.
The maximum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the maximum zoom from the current map type is used instead.
The minimum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the minimum zoom from the current map type is used instead.
